verses.roman:
karmāvadātam etat te
gāyanti svaḥ-striyo muhuḥ
kīrtiṁ parama-puṇyāṁ ca
kīrtayiṣyati bhūr iyam

synonyms: karma—activity; avadātam—without any tinge; etat—all this; te—your; gāyanti—will sing; svaḥ-striyaḥ—women from the heavenly planets; muhuḥ—always; kīrtim—glories; parama-puṇyām—highly glorified and pious; ca—also; kīrtayiṣyati—will continuously chant; bhūḥ—the whole world; iyam—this.
translation: All the blessed women in the heavenly planets will continuously chant about your spotless character at every moment, and the people of this world will also chant your glories continuously.
